title: Sources: Snowflake is in talks to buy app monitoring startup Observe for around $1B; Observe has raised more than $470M (The Information)
summary: The Information: Sources: Snowflake is in talks to buy app monitoring startup Observe for around $1B; Observe has raised more than $470M â€” Snowflake is in talks to buy app monitoring startup Observe Inc. for around $1 billion, which would likely be the biggest deal in Snowflake's history, according to people with knowledge of the discussions.
